Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 42nd overall pick, by Detroit in 1972...
Traded from Detroit to Chicago (N) on 1/31/1973 (Going to CHC: P F. Martinez, 3B L. Parrish. Going to DET: P D. Hughes, LF C. Yastrzemski)...
Earned first career win on 8/14/1975...
Won World Series with Chicago (N) in 1975...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
